Sorry. item.title: Dumped Rubbish, 28th June
item.description:
I reported this over 10 days ago. You reported you could not find the rubbish but it is still there. Go to the end of Bicknor Road. At number 51 turn left and head towards St Johns and Crofton Lane. The rubbish is in the alley between Bicknor Road and Crofton Land. See photo There is also a tree cuttings on the bank on Crofton Lane, opposite St Johns Road. The rubbish is behind the tree cuttings.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bicknor Road, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
